entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm.
